Soldiers’ Mass Execution Reported by Syria Group - Islamist extremists in Syria’s insurgency killed 150 soldiers in a battle for control of an Aleppo suburb this week, including 51 who were executed after they had surrendered (video in comments - NSFW; GORE)

Pope Francis: "I want a mess. We knew that in Rio there would be great disorder, but I want trouble in the dioceses! I want to see the church get closer to the people. I want to get rid of clericalism, the mundane. Because these need to get out!”

UK man convicted of fraud after of selling explosive-detection dowsing rods consisting of completely ineffective, empty plastic boxes with radio antennas attached, for $30,000 each - made millions of dollars in Iraq, Mexico, and Thailand as hundreds died while being "protected" by them.
Archbishop Desmond Tutu: I’d choose Hell over a homophobic Heaven
